SELECT ROUT.ROUT_ID AS ROUT_ID , ROUT.INTER_ROUT_ID AS INTER_ROUT_ID , ROUT.ROUT_NM AS ROUT_NM , DVC_NAME AS DVC_NAME , DLCD.DL_CD_NM AS USER_WAY_DIV_NM , DLCD2.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_TYPE FROM BM_ROUT_INFO ROUT LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DLCD ON DLCD.CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG' AND ROUT.USER_WAY_DIV = DLCD.TXT_VAL1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DLCD2 ON DLCD2.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' AND DLCD2.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD' WHERE ROUT.DVC_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND ( ROUT.ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT.INTER_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT.ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR ROUT.DVC_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') )

SELECT IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) AS POSSIBLE , VHC.VHC_ID AS VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO AS VHC_NO , DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID , VHC.CHAS_NO AS CHAS_NO , CORP.CORP_NM AS CORP_NM , DC1.DL_CD_NM AS AREA_NM , DC2.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , VHC.RELS_DATE AS RELS_DATE , VHC.MODEL_NM AS MODEL_NM , DC3.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , DC4.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_TYPE_NM , DC5.DL_CD_NM AS LF_YN_NM , DC6.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL_NM , VHC.USE_YN AS USE_YN , VHC.REMARK AS REMARK FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CORP_INFO CORP ON VHC.CORP_ID = CORP.CORP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC1 ON VHC.AREA = DC1.DL_CD AND DC1.CO_CD = 'AREA' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC2 ON VHC.MAKER = DC2.DL_CD AND DC2.CO_CD = 'DVC_MAKER' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC3 ON VHC.VHC_KIND = DC3.DL_CD AND DC3.CO_CD = 'VHC_KIND' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC4 ON VHC.VHC_TYPE = DC4.DL_CD AND DC4.CO_CD = 'VHC_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC5 ON VHC.LF_YN = DC5.DL_CD AND DC5.CO_CD = 'LF_YN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DC6 ON VHC.VHC_FUEL = DC6.DL_CD AND DC6.CO_CD = 'VHC_FUEL' LEFT JOIN BM_DESTI_RSV_RST RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DL.TXT_VAL1 = 'RD'
GROUP BY VHC_ID ORDER BY VHC.VHC_ID, DVC.MNG_ID

SELECT DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MNG_ID IS NOT NULL AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (DVC.DVC_KIND = 'CD001' || DVC.DVC_KIND = 'CD002') AND VHC.VHC_ID = #{value}
